mapper.sql: image.file_id as "image.id", image.file_original_name as "image.originalName", image.file_new_name as "image.newName", image.file_base_path as "image.basePath", image.file_relative_path as "image.relativePath", image.file_relative_url as "image.relativeUrl", image.file_mime_type as "image.mimeType", image.file_create_time as "image.createTime", image.file_update_time as "image.updateTime"
